channel.title: Week III on Xtern Bootcamp 2018
channel.description: Recent content in Week III on Xtern Bootcamp 2018

item.title: Day 8: Firebase Authentication
item.description: Monday, July 9, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 8, part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 8, part 1 Topics React Lifecycle Methods: Chart Firebase Authentication ‘firebase/auth’ authWithPopup Signing in and out Handling auth state changes Database rules GitHub OAuth Deployment Firebase Hosting Examples Authentication Firebase isn’t just a real-time database. It can also provide authentication services via email/password, phone, or common third-party services like Github, Facebook, and Google.

item.title: Day 9: React Router
item.description: Tuesday, July 10, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 9, part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 9, part 1 Topics React React.Fragment Conditional Rendering Routing React Router <Router /> Links and NavLinks Routes <Switch>: (Training Docs) history Examples Routing React Router provides a routing solution that allows us to change what UI we render based on the current URL.

item.title: Day 10: More React, JS, and Routing
item.description: Wednesday, July 11, 2018 Lecture Videos (Today we experienced technical difficulties with our recording system. Below are videos from the last session’s Day 10. Please note there are slight differences in the order and approach we took last session. As always, you can view Davey’s commit history on GitHub to see the step-by-step of today’s projects.) Today’s Commit History: Morning Today’s Commit History: Afternoon Videos: Session 2 Day 10: Morning Session 2 Day 10: Afternoon Topics JavaScript Moment.
